title: [Large-Scale] In-Depth Foreign Language Vocabulary Learning Based on Intelligent Context Generation

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary foreign language grammar and mastery of over 1,500 basic vocabulary words
context.additional_context: A personalized learning environment utilizing digital devices. The system applies AI to automatically generate learning contexts based on images captured by learners in their daily lives.

learning_goals: Learners can acquire 50 new vocabulary items per week with 80% accuracy by utilizing context generated in the target language within VR simulation environments
Learners can achieve long-term retention rates of over 70% after three or more repetitions of connecting system-generated contexts with existing vocabulary networks
Learners can improve vocabulary utilization skills by 40% after a 4-week course through a spaced notification system based on AI-analyzed individual satisfaction and interaction data
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
